name: Ampache
description: Ampache is a web-based audio streaming application and file manager that allows you to access your music & videos from anywhere. It features a powerful music catalog, multiple user support, transcoding, streaming, and more.

notes.text: Complete the web-based setup at http://IP/install.php
Database credentials are stored in `~/ampache.creds` - use only the MySQL username and password from this file
During installation, only check 'Create Tables' - leave 'Create Database' and 'Create Database User' unchecked
